{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Netgear SXR80.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = Orbi Pro AX6000 WiFi 6 Tri-band Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = https://www.netgear.com/support/product/sxr80/ |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |fandom = <!-- infodepot.fandom page, included underscores --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Netgear |model = SXR80 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 2024/05/30 |page_start_origon = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_sxr80 |wlclass = AX60003R |series = Orbi |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PY320100484 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ8074A; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 2.2 GHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W29N04GZ; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8075; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 2.5GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6 |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = EoL <!-- per Netgear --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5024; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |axqam1 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad1ax = 1148 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5054; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam2 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad2ax = 2402 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
|wi3_if_name = |rad3chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5054; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad3txchains = 4 |rad3rxchains = 4 |rad3sstreams = 4 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam3 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad3ax = 2402 |acqam3 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad3ac = 1733 |rad3n = 600 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}}
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_orbi_pro_sxr80 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = qualcommax |subtarget = ipq807x |arch = aarch64_cortex-a53 |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = snapshot |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
